#labels Component

|| *Name* || *Description* || *Wiki Page* || *Source Code* || 
||choosel.core||The choosel.core module contains the core functionality that is required by Choosel visualizations. This includes the resource (i.e. data) framework, the management of visualization states (e.g. data, highlighting, selection), the visualization component API, and also more general services such as logging.|| ||[http://code.google.com/p/choosel/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Forg.thechiselgroup.choosel.core Browse SVN]||

||choosel.visualization_component.text|| Text visualization that can be used as tag cloud or sized list || || [http://code.google.com/p/choosel/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Forg.thechiselgroup.choosel.visualization_component.chart Browse SVN]||
